area_name: Nettles are Stinging My Legs Boulder, The

content.description: Sit start and climb up the right arete of the face until you're mostly standing. Then work your way up the face to the top out. Crux is believing that you can find the jug on the top left corner of the face to help with the top out. Watch out for poison ivy growing around this boulder.
content.protection: 1-2 pads at the base, a spotter or a helmet to keep from busting your head on the rock wall 4ft behind you.
content.location: Looking uphill, the climb is on the left side of the obvious large gap on the left end of the boulder.

pathTokens: Nettles are Stinging My Legs Boulder, The
